nodes.text: Bridging the Saga: From Clone Wars to Revenge of the Sith

Bridging the Saga: From Clone Wars to Revenge Of The Sith is a special featurette found on the home video release of Star Wars: Clone Wars Volume One, released in 2005. The featurette shows detailed interviews and behind the scenes clips of the crew as they try to make the series lead into the events that occur in Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
